subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: In a season marked by upsets, it seemed only fitting that the underdog Huskies held off the 11th-ranked Bulls for a victory that put the team in first place in the Big East Conference.
snippet: In a season marked by upsets, it seemed only fitting that the underdog Huskies held off the 11th-ranked Bulls for a victory that put the team in first place in the Big East Conference.
